```{r load_libraries, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
  library(tidyverse)
  library(RColorBrewer)
  library(ggConvexHull)
```

```{r global_options, include=FALSE}
  knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.path='figures/', warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, cache=FALSE, echo=FALSE)
```

```{r load_data}
  grav <- readRDS("../r_files/lab_grav_merged.RDS")
  wbt <- readRDS("../r_files/wbt_data_merged.RDS")
```

```{r}
  grav <-
    grav %>%
    dplyr::filter(id != "3B", fuel != "okote")
```

```{r}
  wbt_plot <-
    wbt %>%
    dplyr::filter(grepl("firepower", pol)) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(value = ifelse(units == "watts", value / 1000, value)) %>%
    tidyr::spread(var, value) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(fp_min = mean - stdev, fp_max = mean + stdev) %>%
    dplyr::rename("firepower" = "mean") %>%
    dplyr::select(-stdev, -pol, -units) %>%
    dplyr::left_join(wbt %>%
                     dplyr::select(id, stove, fuel, pol, var, value,
                                   fuel_notes, protocol, protocol_notes) %>%
                     dplyr::filter(grepl("mce", pol)) %>%
                     tidyr::spread(var, value) %>%
                     dplyr::mutate(mce_min = mean - stdev, mce_max = mean + stdev) %>%
                     dplyr::rename("mce" = "mean") %>%
                     dplyr::select(-stdev, -pol),
                     by = c("id", "protocol", "stove", "fuel", "fuel_notes", "protocol_notes")) %>%
    dplyr::filter(fuel_notes != "wet", grepl("three|metal jiko|rocket|forced|plancha|ceramic jiko", stove))
```

```{r}
  wbt_cont <-
    wbt_plot %>%
    dplyr::filter(grepl("continuous", fst_type)) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(protocol = "WBT")
```

```{r fig_2a, fig.width=10, fig.height=5.5}
  grav %>%
    dplyr::filter(grepl("fp|mce", var), grepl("continuous", fst_type)) %>%
    dplyr::select(-units) %>%
    tidyr::spread(var, val) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(protocol = "FST") %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = fp, y = mce, shape = fuel, color = protocol)) +
      geom_point(size = 2, alpha = 0.75, stroke = 1.5) +
      geom_errorbarh(data = wbt_cont,
                     aes(x = firepower, y = mce, xmax = fp_max, xmin = fp_min), height = 0, size = 1,
                     color =  "#43a2ca", alpha = 0.8) +
      geom_errorbar(data = wbt_cont,
                    aes(x = firepower, y = mce, ymin = mce_min, ymax = mce_max), width = 0, size = 1, 
                    color = "#43a2ca", alpha = 0.8) +
      geom_point(data = wbt_cont, aes(x = firepower, y = mce, shape = fuel, color = protocol), size = 3,
                 alpha = 0.75, stroke = 1.5) +
      guides(shape = guide_legend(override.aes = list(color = "#999999", size = 3))) +
      scale_color_manual(values = c("#a8ddb5", "#43a2ca")) + 
      scale_shape_manual(values = c(1, 16, 5, 6)) +
      theme_bw() + 
      theme(text = element_text(size = 14),
            strip.text.x = element_text(size = 16),
            plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
            legend.position = "right") +
      facet_wrap(~stove, nrow = 2) +
      ggtitle("Continuous-Feed Wood Stoves") +
      scale_x_continuous(name="Firepower (kW)", limits=c(0, 15)) +
      scale_y_continuous(name="MCE", limits=c(0.85, 1.0)) +
      labs(shape = "Fuel", color = "Protocol")
```

```{r}
  wbt_batch <-
    wbt_plot %>%
    dplyr::filter(grepl("batch", fst_type)) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(protocol = "WBT")
```

```{r fig_2b, fig.width=10, fig.height=3.5}
  grav %>%
    dplyr::filter(grepl("fp|mce", var), grepl("batch", fst_type)) %>%
    dplyr::select(-units) %>%
    tidyr::spread(var, val) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(protocol = "FST") %>%
    dplyr::mutate(stove = forcats::fct_relevel(stove,
                                              "ceramic jiko",
                                              "metal jiko",
                                              "forced draft gasifier")) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(fuel = forcats::fct_relevel(fuel,
                                              "coconut charcoal",
                                              "hardwood charcoal",
                                              "eucalyptus (pellets)",
                                              "red oak (milled)")) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = fp, y = mce, color = protocol, shape = fuel)) +
      geom_point(size = 2, alpha = 0.75, stroke = 1.5) +
      geom_errorbarh(data = wbt_batch,
                    aes(x = firepower, y = mce, xmax = fp_max, xmin = fp_min,
                        color = fuel), height = 0.00, size = 1,
                    color = "#43a2ca", alpha = 0.8) +
      geom_errorbar(data = wbt_batch,
                    aes(x = firepower, y = mce, ymin = mce_min, ymax = mce_max,
                        color = protocol), width = 0.0, size = 1,
                    color = "#43a2ca", alpha = 0.8) +
      geom_point(data = wbt_batch, aes(x = firepower, y = mce,
                                       colour = protocol, shape = fuel), size = 3,
                 alpha = 0.75, stroke = 1.5) +
      guides(shape = guide_legend(override.aes = list(color = "#999999", size = 3))) +
      scale_color_manual(values = c("#a8ddb5", "#43a2ca")) + 
      scale_shape_manual(values = c(16, 1, 17, 6)) +
      theme_bw() + 
      theme(text = element_text(size = 14),
            strip.text.x = element_text(size = 16),
            plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
            legend.position = "right") +
      facet_wrap(~stove, nrow = 1) +
      ggtitle("Batch-Fed Stoves") +
      scale_x_continuous(name = "Firepower (kW)", limits = c(0, 6)) +
      scale_y_continuous(name = "MCE", limits = c(0.75, 1.0)) +
      labs(color = "Protocol", shape = "Fuel")
```
